def.name: Client's age is less than 6 months

a:t.name: code

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.TCV: Typhoid conjugate vaccine (TCV) schedule

a:t.value: No typhoid primary series doses were administered

a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Typhoid vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.TCV: Typhoid conjugate vaccine (TCV) schedule

a:t.name: decision

def.name: The latest typhoid dose was administered less than 3 years ago

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: The latest typhoid dose was administered less than 3 years ago

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Typhoid vaccines") < 3 years

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: The latest typhoid dose was administered less than 3 years ago-106

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.ViPS: Unconjugated Vi polysaccharide (ViPS) schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a: Live attenuated Ty21a vaccine schedule

def.name: The latest typhoid dose was administered more than 3 years ago

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: The latest typhoid dose was administered more than 3 years ago

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Typhoid vaccines") ≥ 3 years

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: The latest typhoid dose was administered more than 3 years ago-106

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.ViPS: Unconjugated Vi polysaccharide (ViPS) schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a: Live attenuated Ty21a vaccine schedule

a:s.a:s: "The latest typhoid dose was administered less than 3 years ago"

def.name: Primary series is complete

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Primary series is complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Typhoid vaccines") = TRUE

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: Primary series is complete-93

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a: Live attenuated Ty21a vaccine schedule

a:s.a:s: "One typhoid primary series dose was administered"

operand.name: One typhoid primary series dose was administered

expression.name: Completed the primary vaccination series Observation

def.name: Primary series is not complete

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Primary series is not complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Typhoid vaccines") ≠ TRUE

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: Primary series is not complete-93

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a: Live attenuated Ty21a vaccine schedule

def.name: No live vaccine, other than typhoid, was administered in the past 4 weeks

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No live vaccine, other than typhoid, was administered in the past 4 weeks

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Live vaccine" = TRUE AND "Vaccine type" ≠ "Typhoid vaccines") ≥ 4 weeks

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: No live vaccine, other than typhoid, was administered in the past 4 weeks-132

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a: Live attenuated Ty21a vaccine schedule

a:s.a:s: "No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

expression.name: No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

def.name: Live vaccine, other than typhoid, was administered in the past 4 weeks

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Live vaccine, other than typhoid, was administered in the past 4 weeks

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Live vaccine" = TRUE AND "Vaccine type" ≠ "Typhoid vaccines") < 4 weeks

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: Live vaccine, other than typhoid, was administered in the past 4 weeks-132

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a: Live attenuated Ty21a vaccine schedule

a:s.a:s: "Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

expression.name: Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks
